ModMetaData.name: RimAI Core - Alpha (An Example)
ModMetaData.author: Kilokio
ModMetaData.description:
A comprehensive AI-powered colony management system featuring intelligent decision-making, dual-layer architecture, and advanced workflow optimization.
Features: • Three-Officer System (Governor, Military Officer, Logistics Officer) • Direct Command Interface with natural language processing • W.I.F.E. System for workflow optimization • Dual-layer architecture (LLM Layer + Execution Layer) • Material Depth System with 5 levels of analysis • Support for multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Ollama, etc.)
Requires RimAI Framework to function.
